summary: The citizens of the small British town of Pagford fight for the spot on the parish council after Barry Fairbrother (Rory Kinnear) dies.
cast: Silas Carson|Joe Hurst|Michael Gambon|Rory Kinnear|Abigail Lawrie|Emily Bevan|Rufus Jones|Richard Glover|Monica Dolan|Julia McKenzie|Lolita Chakrabarti|Bryce Sanders|Ria Choony|Keeley Hawes|Sonny Ashbourne Serkis|Brian Vernel|Simon McBurney|Keeley Forsyth|Hetty Baynes|Michele Austin|Menna Trussler|Marie Critchley|Simona Brown|Mary Roscoe|Sope Dirisu|Hayley Downing|Lauren Downing|Vass Anderson|Emilia Fox|Julian Wadham|Sam Redford|Pascal Laurent|Alex Lowe|Derek Hutchinson|Jacob Krichefski|Elizabeth Rider|Teresa Churcher|Phil Dando|Joanna Bobin|Anthony Farrelly|Matt Sapsford|Paul Blackwell|Alec Sleigh

title: Una vacante imprevista
